guides.title: C++ Enums vs Enum Classes: A Complete Guide
guides.description: A comprehensive guide to understanding the differences between C++98 enums and modern enum classes, including their mechanics, use cases, pitfalls, and best practices for building clean structures such as a JSON parser.
guides.author: sel-mlil

guides.title: Sockets & Poll
guides.description: Master network programming with sockets and efficient I/O multiplexing using poll
guides.author: sel-mlil

guides.title: Struct Padding & Alignment
guides.description: Comprehensive guide covering low-level programming concepts and memory management
guides.author: sel-mlil

guides.title: x86 CPU 16-bit Real Mode
guides.description: A comprehensive guide to the 16-bit Real Mode of x86 CPUs, covering its segmented memory, historical context, and role in the modern PC boot process.
guides.author: sel-mlil
